articles.title: "New Important Chapter": EU, India Relaunch Long-Stalled Trade Talks - NDTV
articles.description: The European Union and India agreed Saturday to relaunch long-suspended trade talks in a move hailed by EU chief Charles Michel as a "new important chapter" in ties.
